Police: 7-year-old girl in critical condition after being shot while trick-or-treating in Chicago
01 Nov 2019, 00:13 by EndPlay
CHICAGO - CHICAGO (AP) - Police: 7-year-old girl in critical condition after being shot while trick-or-treating in Chicago.
